General.Name: GreenX Metals Ltd.
General.Description: GreenX Metals Limited engages in the exploration for and evaluation of arctic rift copper project in Greenland. The company was formerly known as Prairie Mining Limited and changed its name to GreenX Metals Limited in December 2021. The company was incorporated in 1957 and is based in Perth, Australia.
